resources.string: Flashing a ROM can manipulate the Batterstats.bin file.\\nThis file is used by the phone to map the battery charging. If this file is corrupted the phone may stops to charge/use the battery correctly. The file has to be recreated. This app will remove the old Batterystats.bin file and let the ROM create a new one. This will fix most common software issues. This cannot however fix any hardware related issues. DISCLAIMER: I\'m not responsible for any damage may or may not occurr while using or not using this app!
To achieve the best results charge your phone up to 100%. It\'s a good practice to disconnect the charger before clicking \"Calibrate\" and let the phones battery deplete to about 5%.
